disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Thursday 17 February to end of Friday 18 February GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Showers forecast on Thursday morning, very windy with widespread gales. Very strong, possibly disruptive winds, on Friday due to Storm Eunice. <br/>Little by way of imported pollution is expected. <br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>
